codeSystems.name: AssessmentContextCS
codeSystems.title: Assessment Context Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes defining the context or timing of a clinical assessment, particularly functional scores.

codeSystems.name: BrainImagingTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Brain Imaging Type Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes specifying the type of brain imaging performed (e.g., CT, MRI).

codeSystems.name: DischargeDeptCS
codeSystems.title: Discharge Department/Service Code System
codeSystems.description: Code system specifying the type of department or service the patient was discharged or transferred to.

codeSystems.name: HemorrhagicStrokeBleedingReasonCS
codeSystems.title: Hemorrhagic Stroke Bleeding Reason Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the reason for bleeding in hemorrhagic stroke cases.

codeSystems.name: InitialCareIntensityCS
codeSystems.title: Initial Care Intensity Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the level of care provided during the patient's initial day(s) in the hospital.

codeSystems.name: MedicationCS
codeSystems.title: Medications CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: Codes for drug products or substances representing the Medications on the patient discharge.

codeSystems.name: MRsScoreCS
codeSystems.title: modified Rankin Scale (mRS) Score Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes representing the modified Rankin Scale (mRS) score for functional outcome.

codeSystems.name: MTICICodeCS
codeSystems.title: mTICI Score Codes CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: Codes representing the mTICI score used to assess the degree of reperfusion after a thrombectomy procedure.

codeSystems.name: MticiScoreCS
codeSystems.title: MTICI Score Code System
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem defines the codes for the modified Treatment in Cerebral Ischemia / modified Thrombolysis in Cerebral Infarction (mTICI) reperfusion score, an ordinal angiographic scale used to grade the extent of downstream tissue reperfusion after endovascular therapy (e.g., mechanical thrombectomy) in acute ischemic stroke. The scale ranges from 0 (no perfusion) to 3 (complete reperfusion) and includes the 2a/2b/2c subgrades to differentiate partial, substantial, and near-complete reperfusion. These codes are intended for consistent, structured capture in HL7® FHIR® resources such as Observation (valueCodeableConcept), Procedure reports, registries, and research datasets. The CodeSystem represents only the final reperfusion grade for the target downstream territory assessed on post-procedural angiography (commonly DSA). It does not encode vessel location, imaging modality details, timing, technique/device used, or adjudication method; those aspects should be modeled separately. Any local definition of “successful reperfusion” (often mTICI ≥ 2b, depending on protocol) should be implemented via ValueSets, decision support logic, or reporting rules rather than by altering the meaning of the underlying codes.

codeSystems.name: ProcedureTimingContextCS
codeSystems.title: Procedure Timing Context Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes defining the timing phase of a procedure relative to the encounter start (e.g., acute vs. post-acute).

codeSystems.name: StrokeArrivalModeCS
codeSystems.title: Initial Care Intensity Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the level of care provided during the patient's initial day(s) in the hospital.

codeSystems.name: StrokeCircumstanceCodesCS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Circumstance Codes CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: Codes for findings related to the circumstances of stroke onset (In-hospital, Wake-up).

codeSystems.name: StrokeDischargeDestinationCS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Discharge Destination Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the possible destinations of the patient upon discharge from the encounter.

codeSystems.name: StrokeEtiologyCS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Etiology Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the etiology of strokes.

codeSystems.name: StrokeProcNotDoneReasonCS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Procedure Not Done Reason Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes specifying the reason principal for not performing a key stroke procedure (Thrombolysis, Thrombectomy).

codeSystems.name: SwallowProceduresCS
codeSystems.title: Swallow Procedures Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes representing various swallowing assessment procedures.

codeSystems.name: SwallowScreenTimeCS
codeSystems.title: Swallowing Screening Timing Category Code System
codeSystems.description: Temporal categories relative to stroke onset for swallowing screening.

codeSystems.name: ThrombectomyComplicationCS
codeSystems.title: Thrombectomy Complication Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes specifying the specific complications of thrombectomy to record.

codeSystems.name: TimingMetricCodesCS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Timing Metric Codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Codes for key process timing metrics in acute stroke care (D2N, D2G).
